name.ja: <ruby>粛<rt>しゅく</rt></ruby><ruby>声<rt>せい</rt></ruby>なる<ruby>祝<rt>しゅく</rt></ruby><ruby>福<rt>ふく</rt></ruby>

text.en: You can target 1 of your "Silenforc" cards that is banished or in your GY, except "Silenforcing Blessing"; add it to your hand. If a non-Ritual Monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned face-up: You can Ritual Summon 1 LIGHT Warrior or Dragon Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing monsters from your hand and/or field whose total Levels equal or exceed the Ritual Monster's Level, and if you do, it cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only use each effect of "Silenforcing Blessing" once per turn.
